verses.verse: Praise <WH1984> ye Jehovah<WH3050>. I will give thanks<WH3034> unto Jehovah<WH3050> with my whole heart<WH3824>, In the council<WH5475> of the upright<WH3477>, and in the congregation<WH5712>.
The works<WH4639> of Jehovah<WH3068> are great<WH1419>, Sought out<WH1875> of all them that have pleasure therein<WH2656>.
His work<WH6467> is honor<WH1935> and majesty<WH1926>; And his righteousness<WH6666> endureth<WH5975> for ever<WH5703>.
He hath made<WH6213> his wonderful works<WH6381> to be remembered<WH2143>: Jehovah<WH3068> is gracious<WH2587> and merciful<WH7349>.
He hath given<WH5414> food<WH2964> unto them that fear<WH3373> him<WH5769>: He will ever be mindful<WH2142> of his covenant<WH1285>.
He hath showed<WH5046> his people<WH5971> the power<WH3581> of his works<WH4639>, In giving<WH5414> them the heritage<WH5159> of the nations<WH1471>.
The works<WH4639> of his hands<WH3027> are truth<WH571> and justice<WH4941>; All his precepts<WH6490> are sure<WH539>.
They are established<WH5564> for ever<WH5703> and ever<WH5769>; They are done<WH6213> in truth<WH571> and uprightness<WH3477>.
He hath sent<WH7971> redemption<WH6304> unto his people<WH5971>; He hath commanded<WH6680> his covenant<WH1285> for ever<WH5769>: Holy<WH6918> and reverend<WH3372> is his name<WH8034>.

The fear<WH3374> of Jehovah<WH3068> is the beginning<WH7225> of wisdom<WH2451>; A good<WH2896> understanding<WH2451> have all they that do<WH6213> his commandments<WH8416>: His praise endureth<WH5975> for ever<WH5703>.
